Field.Value: Well he kept trying to take my pants off even though I kept telling him I wasn't ready. You want to know what he said to me? “Don’t worry, baby. You’re gonna like this.” I didn’t want to, I really didn’t, but he just wasn’t listening. It was horrible.|Afterwards, we just watched TV and then he walked me home.

Field.Value: In this story, Gina is a great example of an active bystander.
